ComicInfo.Title: Season of the Witch-Woman!
ComicInfo.Summary: Linda offers her origin story to Ghost Rider, chronicling her rise as Witch-Woman. Still entrenched in her deal with Satan, Ghost Rider has little choice but to turn on a former ally...
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-20 20:01:38. [CVDB13485] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:51:23. [Issue ID 26545]
ComicInfo.Characters: Faith Herbert [Zephyr],Sisterhood of Satan (introduction in flashback, villain),Harbinger Renegades [Peter Stanchek,Torque],Jennifer Glazer (introduction in flashback, villain),Satan (introduction in flashback, villain),Kris Hathaway,Witch-Woman [Linda Littletrees],@x
